Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Enacts the "City of Dunkirk Revenue Anticipation Note Refinancing Act"; makes an appropriation therefor
Summary: Enacts the "City of Dunkirk Revenue Anticipation Note Refinancing Act" to authorize a loan to be made from the state to the city of Dunkirk (Part A); makes an appropriation therefor (Part B).
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing a loan from the state to the city of Dunkirk (Part A); and making an appropriation therefor (Part B)
